name: Single-size double decker bedframe and mattresses
description:
Please indicate only relevant details necessary for this PIO request.

Client and her husband are married with 6 children. Client’s husband is the sole breadwinner for the family and earning an average monthly income of S$1900. Client has not been able to work due to her caregiving responsibilities for their two young special needs children. 

The family are currently sleeping with their mattresses on the floor as they could not afford to buy a bedframe. Their existing mattresses have become saggy which they often waking up having body aches. In addition, client has been having difficulties to get up from the mattress as she recently sprained her leg. 

In view of the reasons above, we would like to request for a queen size bed and mattress for client & husband as well as a single size double decker bed and mattresses for client’s kids.

name: A Video Camera Tripod
description:
The Helping Hand is reaching out with a heartfelt appeal for your support towards our mission of transforming lives through our Rehabilitation and Reintegration Programme.

Our work is centered around empowering individuals on their journey towards positive change and reintegration into society. Each day, we witness incredible stories of resilience, determination, and transformation among those in our program. These stories are not just moments; they are powerful testaments to the potential for change and hope in every individual.

To effectively capture and share these invaluable narratives, we require critical media equipment. A Video Camera Tripod is essential for stable and professional video recordings, capturing the visual essence of each transformational story. 

Your generous donation towards this cause will directly contribute to our ability to share these narratives effectively. By supporting our media equipment appeal, you are not just investing in cameras and microphones; you are investing in the lives of individuals striving to rebuild, overcome obstacles, and contribute positively to society.

We invite you to be part of this impactful journey by contributing to our media equipment fund. Your generosity will play a pivotal role in our ability to amplify these stories of hope, resilience, and transformation. Please support cause. Every contribution, regardless of size, is immensely appreciated and brings us one step closer to our goal.

Thank you for considering our appeal and for your unwavering support in our mission to empower lives and build a better future for all.

name: Non stick frying pan
description:
Client is requesting two big nonstick pans deep enough to prevent splatters. 
Client is an elderly lady who is still providing caregiving to her adult child with multiple medical conditions. Due to the adult's child's multiple medical conditions, she is certified as unable to work. The family has no source of additional income to buy extra non-stick pans. The elderly hopes to get a non-stick as she has multiple medical conditions and does not have the strength to clean it when it sticks. The family needs to cook to reduce financial costs and buying food from outside would not aid the elderly client and her daughter's health. As such, a non-stick pan would allow the elderly to cook with ease and provide care for her adult child.
